analysis.description:
Reentrancy in REDCrowdfund.openCrowdfund (/unique_chucks/10/0x74384b6355ad7892c7be6cb524d72768a3883f0c.sol#528-533):
	External calls:
	- RED.startCrowdfund() (/unique_chucks/10/0x74384b6355ad7892c7be6cb524d72768a3883f0c.sol#531-533)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isOpen (/unique_chucks/10/0x74384b6355ad7892c7be6cb524d72768a3883f0c.sol#533)

REDCrowdfund.openCrowdfund (/unique_chucks/10/0x74384b6355ad7892c7be6cb524d72768a3883f0c.sol#528-533) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-RED.startCrowdfund() (/unique_chucks/10/0x74384b6355ad7892c7be6cb524d72768a3883f0c.sol#531-533)
